text: Edgware () is a suburban town in northern Greater London, mostly in the London Borough of Barnet. As of 2011, the town had a population of 76,506 and is made up of five wards from both Barnet and Harrow boroughs.With the addition of the Hale ward http://hidden-london.com/gazetteer/edgware/ ==References== Category:London Borough of Barnet Category:Towns in London
title: Edgware
